summary: Compilation of my mods for Skyrim applied to content of Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
Changes characteristics of commonly found creatures, all spells, all base weapons, armor, Dawnguard and Falmer equipment. Having Falmer Heavy armor coupled with Falmer Light I found Hardened to be redundant so I removed its traces of use (it is still present in game but cannot be found). All changes are made for balancing purposes. List of all changes is included with mod.

Check out my other mods for Morrowind, Oblivion, Skyrim and Skyrim SE:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/8650363?tab=user+files]mithrilarmor[/url]
author: mithrilarmor
